name.ja: <ruby>古代の機械猟犬<rt>アンティーク・ギアハウンドドッグ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Your opponent has a monster on their field and you have another face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent. Then, you can Fusion Summon an EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster whose ATK equals its own DEF by sending Effect Monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material.
